bug: When you have a chat with a user and delete your account, and error occurs when the other user tries opening a chat with the deleted account.
When you have a chat open and click on the chat card from the chat list, the role-play ad data goes undefined.
When you repost more than 1 ad, then the frontend UI appears to duplicate the ad more than once unless you refresh the page

Logging in through Google on mobile can sometimes cause the page to refresh and log you out immediately after logging in. This seems to be an issue with the Google login flow on mobile devices and is being investigated
